description: A security guard testified that they witnessed the defendant thwarting a pickpocketing attempt and apprehending the perpetrator.
prosecutionSentence: The security guard's testimony affirms that the defendant actively intervened to prevent a pickpocketing incident and aided in apprehending the actual perpetrator, highlighting their innocence.
defenseSentence: My client's actions demonstrate their commitment to upholding security and preventing pickpocketing, as evidenced by their assistance in apprehending the perpetrator.

description: Surveillance footage captured the defendant reaching into the victim's pocket and taking out their wallet.
prosecutionSentence: The video clearly shows the defendant engaging in pickpocketing and unlawfully taking the victim's wallet.
defenseSentence: My client was merely attempting to return the victim's dropped wallet and did not have any intention to steal it.

description: Witnesses observed the defendant bumping into the victim in a crowded area and quickly walking away, leaving the victim without their phone.
prosecutionSentence: Multiple witnesses saw the defendant intentionally create a distraction and steal the victim's phone while in a public space.
defenseSentence: My client accidentally bumped into the victim and had no knowledge of their phone being taken.
